CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper June 18, 1966, pg. 2B, reads: "NEED Volunteers - This group of volunteers are busily completing plans for the Third Annual NEED Banquet set for June 20, at 6:30 P.M. at the Hilton Hotel.  Seated left to right: Carleen Hughes, office secretary; Mrs. Arthur J. Edmunds, Mrs. Sydney Klein, Samuel Steward Jr., a student aided by NEED: Mrs. James A. Jordon, president of NEED; Mrs. Richard McCoy and Mrs. William E. Green.  Mrs. David Stahl is missing from picture. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Volunteers planning NEED banquet, from left: Carleen Hughes, Gladys Edmunds, Mrs. Klein, Samuel Stewart Jr., NEED president Marion Bond Jordon, Mrs. McCoy, and Mrs. Green gathered in interior with NEED inscribed on chalkboard in background
